name: Drew Scanlon's Video Producer Trainer
description:
Hey jerk, do you have what it takes to be a Giant Bomb Video Producer? Well download this and find out! This simulator is so realistic you'll have a full-blown existential crisis!

Just get a load of these features:

  • Sounds
  • Buttons
  • Things on fire what should not be on fire
  • Insults like "Hey, jerk"
  • A "Quit Game" button
  • HALON HALON HALON (can only be used once)
